issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Set SO_KEEPALIVE on all our sockets

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: SO_KEEPALIVE is not set on things like datastreamer sockets which can cause lingering ESTABLISHED sockets when there is a network glitch.
fields.summary: Set SO_KEEPALIVE on DN server sockets

comments.body:
Attached patch to set socketAlive flag in {{DataStreamer}} & {{DataXceiver}}

New test cases are not required as the changes are trivial.
